metadata.title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Mid Rise Feminine Cut Bermuda Short
features: STYLE - Mid Rise bermuda short sits just below natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly, belt loops and contour fit body
VERSATILITY - Pairs great with any top from fashionable to a basic tee shirt and all footwear from trendy shoes to your favorite flats; ideal travel attire
LENGTH - this cute ladies bermuda has an 11 inch inseam with a 18 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
description: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Apparel Mid rise bermuda short sits just below tural waistline with fully functiol pockets, easy front zipper fly, standard size belt loops and contour fit stretch body. This cute mid waist long short is contoured from hips to hemline with a skinny leg fit for that comfortable feel you've come to love. Pairs great with any top from fashioble to a novelty tee shirt and all footwear from trendy shoes to your favorite sneakers or boots Ideal light weight travel attire, perfect to dress up for work, casually attending a class or fun get togethers with friends. Available in assorted color washes, see color me for specifics. Gloria Vanderbilt women's jeans, Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
